```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(broom)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```

```{r}
#read in data, clean up data, and select variables for project
lizards_2 <- read_csv(here("data", "lizards.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(spp, sex, total_length) %>% 
  filter(sex == "F") %>% 
  filter(spp == c("CNUN", "CNTE"))
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_beeswarm(data = lizards_2, 
                aes(x = spp, 
                    y = total_length, 
                    color = spp), 
                show.legend = FALSE)+ 
  labs(title = "Length of female lizards by species", 
       x = "Species", 
       y = "Total Length (mm)") + 
    scale_x_discrete(labels = c("CNTE" = "C. tessalatus", 
                              "CNUN" = "C. uniparens")) + 
  theme_minimal()
```
